LowEndBox Has Mind-Blowing Offers Coming This Black Friday/Cyber Monday Season!

black friday November 25, 2020 @ 4:00 am, by raindog308

It’s almost that time again!

I’ve spent the last couple weeks feverishly compiling all kinds off special offers providers are bringing to our readers and there is an astonishing array of fantastic deals you’re going to have the opportunity to get your hands on over the next week.

Usually we try to get 3-4 offers a week out to our readers, but between Wednesday (November 25) and Monday (November 30), we’ve got more than 30 offers ready for you!  

And while LEB offers are usually some of the best offers on the web, these are barnstorming, mind-blowing, knock-your-socks-off, phone-your-friends, fist-pumping, can’t-click-fast-enough offers!

How’s It Going to Work This Year?

Here’s the schedule (all times Eastern US):

  • Thursday, November 26 (Thanksgiving in the US): A few early offers, including some real amazing ones.
  • Friday, November 27 (Black Friday): From 4am to 8pm (Eastern US), we’ve got offers dropping every one to two hours!
  • Saturday, November 28 and Sunday, November 29: The fun continues with offers throughout the day.
  • Monday, November 30 (Cyber Monday): We’re again flooding the airwaves from 4am to 8pm with offers dropping every two hours.

Check back often!  Reload frequently!  There’s something for everyone at great prices.

What Kind of Offers Are We Talking About?

Here’s some previews for what’s coming up this season:

  • 2GB KVM with DDoS protection in LA for $18.49/year!

  • VPS in Russia for $4.90/mo ($3.85/mo on annual)!
  • 1GB for $16.25/year or 2GB for $22.79 – or even a 2GB Windows for $60/year!
  • €15/year for 1GB in London!
  • Or in Los Angeles or Bulgaria!
  • Or a special 1GB VPS for $1 per year offer!
  • Dedi options like a 16GB L5640 with 1TB HDD (or 120GB SSD) for $25.97/mo!
  • 512MB for $10/year in LA/NJ/NV/FL!
  • Unlimited bandwidth VPS in Germany for $39.99/year!
  • Dedi with 2xE5-2450 with 32GB of RAM and 20TB of traffic for €40/mo in Romania or Norway!

Stay tuned!
